Class SimpleShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape2D
      • SimpleShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Translatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ellipse, Rectangle

    abstract class SimpleShape
extends Shape2D
implements Translatable
    [SimpleShape.java] The class is an abstract class that holds the basic information of all simple shapes available to the user. These simple shapes include squares, rectangles, circles and ellipses. All simple shapes have coordinates for reference.
    Version:
    1.0, Oct 9, 2020
    Author:
    Braydon Wang

      (package private) abstract void calculatePerimeter()
      An abstract method that enforces the calculation of the shape's perimeter
      void translate(int horizontal, int vertical)
      This method translates the coordinate of the shape by a horizontal and vertical shift.
